title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7599 (December 4th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update v4.0.7599, released December 4th, 2013. (Horde and Alliance)



Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------

[A] Achievements

Fixed an achieve ID for the Limnologist achievement



[B] Professions

Fixed a spell ID in the cooking guide

Fixed a routing error in the Skinning guide

Fixed a routing error in the Cooking guide

Coordinates added for Expert engineering gather step



[H] Leveling

Terokkar Forest:

Moved a few guide steps to better spawn points for quests

Added extra waypoints for additional quest mobs



Nagrand:

Added tips and extra waypoints for additional quest mobs

Moved a guide step to a better spawn point for the quest

Fixed a guide step that wasn't completing
